name: GRAMMAR TEST
description: This is the easiest way to improve your score. Avoid the most common mistakes test takers make. Focus only on what is important. Grammar books may now be thrown away!
details:
Tired of figuring out what a predicate or a subjunctive is? These tests are designed to help you avoid the mistakes that cost you the score you want without suffering through the boring mechanics of grammar.

Questions in these tests are based on responses submitted by actual test takers!

Let others’ mistakes be your guiding light.

groups.name: Grammar
groups.description: Grammar. A confusing point for both native and foreign English speakers is whether to use used to or use to in a phrase. Used to is used to describe an action ..

tests.name: Grammer Test 1
tests.instructions:
• Each questions has 4 options
  • Each question carries 1 mark
